Sourcegraph is building the code intelligence platform that powers the world's best code search and Cody, the most popular open-source AI coding assistant.

Our mission is to automate the toil that takes up 99% of developer time, enabling every dev to focus on the creative spark of software developmentâ€”and make software creation accessible to all of humanity. Our core tech includes the world's most advanced code knowledge graph, global search index, frontier LLMs (proprietary and open-source models with in-house finetuning), and OpenCtx, an open protocol for technical context. Our customers range from startups to the Fortune 500. Our founders code.
